question: Summarise what topics are covered across all first-year chemistry modules.
answer:
Answer: The topics covered in this module include infra-red and Raman spectroscopy, polymer chemistry, and solution equilibria.

Evidence:
- "1- Infra-red and Raman spectroscopy: molecular symmetry and allowed transitions" (source: CHEM1102.html | CHEM1102)
- "2- Polymer chemistry: ionic and free-radical polymerisation" (source: CHEM1102.html | CHEM1102)
